00052 
00053 String CommandShell::ms_history_file = "";
00054 
00055 namespace {
00056   void termination_handler (int signum) {
00057     write_history(CommandShell::ms_history_file.c_str());
00058     exit(1);
00059   }
00060 
00061   const char *help_text =
00062   "\n" \
00063   "Interpreter Meta Commands\n" \
00064   "-------------------------\n" \
00065   "?          (\\?) Synonym for `help'.\n" \
00066   "clear      (\\c) Clear command.\n" \
00067   "exit       (\\q) Exit program. Same as quit.\n" \
00068   "print      (\\p) Print current command.\n" \
00069   "quit       (\\q) Quit program.\n" \
00070   "source <f> (.)  Execute commands in file <f>.\n" \
00071   "system     (\\!) Execute a system shell command.\n" \
00072   "\n";
00073 }

00076 
00079 CommandShell::CommandShell(const String &program_name,
00080     CommandInterpreterPtr &interp_ptr, PropertiesPtr &props)
00081     : m_program_name(program_name), m_interp_ptr(interp_ptr), m_props(props),
00082       m_batch_mode(false), m_silent(false), m_test_mode(false),
00083       m_no_prompt(false), m_cont(false), m_line_read(0), m_notify(false) {
00084   m_prompt_str = program_name + "> ";
00085   m_batch_mode = m_props->has("batch");
00086   if (m_batch_mode)
00087     m_silent = true;
00088   else
00089     m_silent = m_props->get_bool("silent");
00090   m_test_mode = m_props->has("test-mode");
00091   m_no_prompt = m_props->has("no-prompt");
00092 
00093   m_notify = m_props->has("notification-address");
00094   if(m_notify) {
00095     String notification_address = m_props->get_str("notification-address");
00096     m_notifier_ptr = new Notifier (notification_address.c_str());
00097   }
00098 
00099 }

00105 char *CommandShell::rl_gets () {
00106   if (m_line_read) {
00107     free (m_line_read);
00108     m_line_read = (char *)NULL;
00109   }
00110 
00111   /* Get a line from the user. */
00112   if (m_batch_mode || m_no_prompt || m_silent || m_test_mode) {
00113     if (!getline(cin, m_input_str))
00114       return 0;
00115     boost::trim(m_input_str);
00116     if (m_input_str.find("quit", 0) != 0 && !m_silent)
00117       cout << m_input_str << endl;
00118     return (char *)m_input_str.c_str();
00119   }
00120   else if (!m_cont)
00121     m_line_read = readline(m_prompt_str.c_str());
00122   else
00123     m_line_read = readline("         -> ");
00124 
00125   /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00126   if (!m_batch_mode && !m_test_mode && m_line_read && *m_line_read)
00127     add_history (m_line_read);
00128 
00129   return m_line_read;
00130 }

00134 void CommandShell::add_options(PropertiesDesc &desc) {
00135   desc.add_options()
00136     ("batch", "Disable interactive behavior")
00137     ("no-prompt", "Do not display an input prompt")
00138     ("test-mode", "Don't display anything that might change from run to run "
00139         "(e.g. timing statistics)")
00140     ("timestamp-format", Property::str(), "Output format for timestamp. "
00141         "Currently the only formats are 'default' and 'usecs'")
00142     ("notification-address", Property::str(), "[<host>:]<port> "
00143         "Send notification datagram to this address after each command.")
00144     ;
00145 
00146 }

00149 int CommandShell::run() {
00150   const char *line;
00151   queue<string> command_queue;
00152   String command;
00153   String timestamp_format;
00154   String source_commands;
00155   const char *base, *ptr;
00156 
00157   ms_history_file = (String)getenv("HOME") + "/." + m_program_name + "_history";
00158 
00159   if (m_props->has("timestamp-format"))
00160     timestamp_format = m_props->get_str("timestamp-format");
00161 
00162   if (timestamp_format != "")
00163     m_interp_ptr->set_timestamp_output_format(timestamp_format);
00164 
00165   if (!m_batch_mode && !m_silent) {
00166 
00167     read_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00168 
00169     cout << endl;
00170     cout << "Welcome to the " << m_program_name << " command interpreter."
00171          << endl;
00172     cout << "For information about Hypertable, visit http://www.hypertable.org/"
00173          << endl;
00174     cout << endl;
00175     cout << "Type 'help' for a list of commands, or 'help shell' for a" << endl;
00176     cout << "list of shell meta commands." << endl;
00177     cout << endl << flush;
00178   }
00179 
00180   if (signal (SIGINT, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00181     signal (SIGINT, SIG_IGN);
00182   if (signal (SIGHUP, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00183     signal (SIGHUP, SIG_IGN);
00184   if (signal (SIGTERM, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00185     signal (SIGTERM, SIG_IGN);
00186 
00187   m_accum = "";
00188   if (!m_batch_mode)
00189     using_history();
00190   while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00191 
00192     try {
00193 
00194       if (*line == 0)
00195         continue;
00196 
00197       if (!strncasecmp(line, "help shell", 10)) {
00198         cout << help_text;
00199         continue;
00200       }
00201       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "help", 4)
00202                || !strncmp(line, "\\h", 2) || *line == '?') {
00203         command = line;
00204         std::transform(command.begin(), command.end(), command.begin(),
00205                        ::tolower);
00206         trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00207         m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00208         if (m_notify)
00209           m_notifier_ptr->notify();
00210         continue;
00211       }
00212       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "quit") || !strcasecmp(line, "exit")
00213                || !strcmp(line, "\\q")) {
00214         if (!m_batch_mode)
00215           write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00216         return 0;
00217       }
00218       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "print") || !strcmp(line, "\\p")) {
00219         cout << m_accum << endl;
00220         continue;
00221       }
00222       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "clear") || !strcmp(line, "\\c")) {
00223         m_accum = "";
00224         m_cont = false;
00225         continue;
00226       }
00227       else if (!strncmp(line, "source", 6) || line[0] == '.') {
00228         if ((base = strchr(line, ' ')) == 0) {
00229           cout << "syntax error: source or '.' must be followed by a space "
00230               "character" << endl;
00231           continue;
00232         }
00233         String fname = base;
00234         trim_if(fname, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00235         off_t flen;
00236         if ((base = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(fname.c_str(), &flen)) == 0)
00237           continue;
00238         source_commands = "";
00239         ptr = strtok((char *)base, "\n\r");
00240         while (ptr != 0) {
00241           command = ptr;
00242           boost::trim(command);
00243           if (command.find("#") != 0)
00244             source_commands += command + " ";
00245           ptr = strtok(0, "\n\r");
00246         }
00247         if (source_commands == "")
00248           continue;
00249         delete [] base;
00250         line = source_commands.c_str();
00251       }
00252       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "system", 6) || !strncmp(line, "\\!", 2)) {
00253         String command = line;
00254         size_t offset = command.find_first_of(' ');
00255         if (offset != String::npos) {
00256           command = command.substr(offset+1);
00257           trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00258           system(command.c_str());
00259         }
00260         continue;
00261       }
00262       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "status") || !strcmp(line, "\\s")) {
00263         cout << endl << "no status." << endl << endl;
00264         continue;
00265       }
00266 
00267 
00271       base = line;
00272       ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00273       while (ptr) {
00274         m_accum += string(base, ptr-base);
00275         if (m_accum.size() > 0) {
00276           boost::trim(m_accum);
00277           if (m_accum.find("#") != 0)
00278             command_queue.push(m_accum);
00279           m_accum = "";
00280           m_cont = false;
00281         }
00282         base = ptr+1;
00283         ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00284       }
00285       command = string(base);
00286       boost::trim(command);
00287       if (command != "" && command.find("#") != 0) {
00288         m_accum += command;
00289         boost::trim(m_accum);
00290       }
00291       if (m_accum != "") {
00292         m_cont = true;
00293         m_accum += " ";
00294       }
00295 
00296       while (!command_queue.empty()) {
00297         if (command_queue.front() == "quit"
00298             || command_queue.front() == "exit") {
00299           if (!m_batch_mode)
00300             write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00301           return 0;
00302         }
00303         command = command_queue.front();
00304         command_queue.pop();
00305         if (!strncmp(command.c_str(), "pause", 5)) {
00306           String sec_str = command.substr(5);
00307           boost::trim(sec_str);
00308           char *endptr;
00309           long secs = strtol(sec_str.c_str(), &endptr, 0);
00310           if ((secs == 0 && errno == EINVAL) || *endptr != 0) {
00311             cout << "error: invalid seconds specification" << endl;
00312             if (m_batch_mode)
00313               return 1;
00314           }
00315           else
00316             poll(0, 0, secs*1000);
00317         }
00318         else {
00319           m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00320           if(m_notify)
00321             m_notifier_ptr->notify();
00322         }
00323       }
00324 
00325     }
00326     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00327       cerr << "Error: " << e.what() << " - " << Error::get_text(e.code())
00328            << endl;
00329       if(m_notify)
00330         m_notifier_ptr->notify();
00331       if (m_batch_mode)
00332         return 1;
00333       m_accum = "";
00334       while (!command_queue.empty())
00335         command_queue.pop();
00336       m_cont=false;
00337     }
00338 
00339   }
00340 
00341   if (!m_batch_mode)
00342     write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00343 
00344   return 0;
00345 }
